source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT
    DT.FKDAT AS FECHA_FACTURACION,
    DT.MENGE AS CANTIDAD,
    DT.FAKWR AS MONTO_FACTURADO,
    LFA1.NAME1 AS NOMBRE_PROVEEDOR
FROM
    gta.INV_HEADER HD
    INNER JOIN gta.INVOICING DT ON HD.FPLNR = DT.FPLNR
    LEFT JOIN gta.KNB1 KNB1 ON DT.BUKRS = KNB1.BUKRS
    LEFT JOIN gta.LFA1 LFA1 ON DT.LIFNR = LFA1.LIFNR
